name: Duvall Wi-Fi Network Map
summary: A DWFN file is a Wi-Fi network map created by Duvall Wi-Fi Network Mapper (DWNM). It contains a visual representation of all the devices and access points within a Wi-Fi network. Using DWNM and a DWFN file, network administrators can manage and monitor a Wi-Fi network's connections, signal strength, and traffic.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
